values: The Salvation of Infants | Pr Jan Prorok

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Jan Prorok, a CREC Pastor from the Czech Republic, about some questions that arose from his outstanding recent sermon, “Greater Confidence than David’s” (https://allsaintskirk.com/sermons/greater-confidence-than-davids/). They discuss the salvation of unbelievers’ children who tragically die in infancy, the apostle Paul’s enigmatic teaching about the sanctification of the unbelieving spouse in 1 Corinthians […]
